dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.add
dt-option.summary: Set the message to be displayed in the SearchBuilder add button

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.add` changes what will be displayed in the text of the SearchBuilder add button.

dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchBuilder will set the add button to display a default text, in this case `'Add Condition'`.
The value of `-init language.searchBuilder.add` is passed into an `-api i18n()` function.
